div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"widget":"Div","widgetId":"0_1","props":{"name":"layoutGrid1","class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"widget":"Div","widgetId":"0_2","props":{"name":"","class":"row","content":[{"widget":"Div","widgetId":"0_3","props":{"name":"","class":"col-md-12","content":[{"widget":"Text","widgetId":"0_4","props":{"name":"text2","class":"mx-name-text2 pageheader-title spacing-outer-bottom","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Get Uuid"],"friendlyId":"GetUuid.Home_Web.text2"}},"renderMode":"h3"}},{"widget":"Text","widgetId":"0_5","props":{"name":"text1","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Clicking the button will return a version 4 (random) UUID according to RFC4122 structure.\r\nCollision chance is said to be around one in a billion."],"friendlyId":"GetUuid.Home_Web.text1"}},"renderMode":"span","class":"mx-name-text1"}}]}}]}},{"widget":"Div","widgetId":"0_6","props":{"name":"","class":"row","content":[{"widget":"Div","widgetId":"0_7","props":{"name":"","class":"col-md-12","content":[{"widget":"ActionButton","widgetId":"0_0","props":{"name":"actionButton1","buttonId":"0_0","class":"mx-name-actionButton1 spacing-outer-top-large","renderType":"button","buttonClass":"btn-default","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Click here for random UUID"],"friendlyId":"GetUuid.Home_Web.actionButton1"}},"tooltip":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":[""]}},"action":{"$type":"ActionProperty","action":{"type":"callMicroflow","argMap":{},"config":{"name":"GetUuid.ACT_GetRandomUuidExample","validate":"view"}},"abortOnServerValidation":true},"disabledDuringAction":true}}]}}]}}]}}]
